attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ'
select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ' and 1=2
select fabh as key, famc as value from znbs_fapz where khnf=$khnd$ and khzq=$khzq$ and khdx = '2' and 'test'<>'test$khzq$'
select distinct pffa.KHQS from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khnf = $khnd$ and pffa.khzt = '1' and fapz.KHZQ=$khzq$

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select t.khnf,t.khzq,t.khqs,t.famc,t.jgdh,t.jgmc,t.gwmc,t.hydh,t.hymc,t.df,t.pm, t.tjrq,t.hykhdxdh,t.fabh,t.yykhdxdh,t.khzq1,t.khqs1,t.gwbh,t.py from ( select yyjg.khnf, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '第'|| cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, fapz.famc, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, sum(yyjg) df, rank() over(order by sum(yyjg) desc) pm , substr(cast(yyjg.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 6) as tjrq, hy.khdxdh hykhdxdh, yyjg.fabh, yyjg.khdxdh yykhdxdh , yyjg.khzq khzq1, yyjg.khqs khqs1 , hygw.gwbh , F_GET_STRLIST1('znbs_zxpffa where fabh='||cast(yyjg.fabh as char(10)) ||' and khqs ='||cast(yyjg.khqs as char(10))||' and khdxdh='|| cast(yyjg.khdxdh as char(10)),'py',';','0',yyjg.fabh,yyjg.khqs,yyjg.khdxdh ) py from znbs_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join znbs_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_hygw hygw on yyjg.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khjg on fapz.znbs=khjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and yyjg.khnf=$khnd$ and yyjg.khzq=$khzq$ and yyjg.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$famc$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and hygw.gwbh='$gwmc$' group by yyjg.khnf, yyjg.khzq, yyjg.khqs, fapz.famc, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, tjrq, hy.khdxdh, yyjg.fabh, yyjg.khdxdh, hy.hydh, hy.hymc,hygw.gwbh order by yyjg.khnf desc, yyjg.khzq desc ,yyjg.khqs desc ,df desc ) t inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($sysdate$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qxhy on t.hykhdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh order by t.pm

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select t.khnf,t.khzq,t.khqs,t.famc,t.jgdh,t.jgmc,t.gwmc,t.hydh,t.hymc,t.df,t.pm, t.tjrq,t.hykhdxdh,t.fabh,t.yykhdxdh,t.khzq1,t.khqs1,t.gwbh,t.py from ( select yyjg.khnf, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '第'|| cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, fapz.famc, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, sum(yyjg) df, rank() over(order by sum(yyjg) desc) pm , substr(cast(yyjg.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 6) as tjrq, hy.khdxdh hykhdxdh, yyjg.fabh, yyjg.khdxdh yykhdxdh , yyjg.khzq khzq1, yyjg.khqs khqs1 , hygw.gwbh , F_GET_STRLIST1('znbs_zxpffa where fabh='||cast(yyjg.fabh as char(10)) ||' and khqs ='||cast(yyjg.khqs as char(10))||' and khdxdh='|| cast(yyjg.khdxdh as char(10)),'py',';','0',yyjg.fabh,yyjg.khqs,yyjg.khdxdh ) py from znbs_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join znbs_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_hygw hygw on yyjg.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khjg on fapz.znbs=khjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and yyjg.khnf=$khnd$ and yyjg.khzq=$khzq$ and yyjg.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$famc$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and hygw.gwbh='$gwmc$' group by yyjg.khnf, yyjg.khzq, yyjg.khqs, fapz.famc, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, tjrq, hy.khdxdh, yyjg.fabh, yyjg.khdxdh, hy.hydh, hy.hymc,hygw.gwbh order by yyjg.khnf desc, yyjg.khzq desc ,yyjg.khqs desc ,df desc ) t inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($sysdate$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qxhy on t.hykhdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh order by t.pm ) t
